scenarios.name: Real Estate Analyzer Search completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Real Estate Analyzer Search operations
scenarios.when: a valid Real Estate Analyzer Search request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Real Estate Analyzer Search handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Real Estate Analyzer Search operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Real Estate Analyzer Search records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Real Estate Analyzer Search
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
